description_for_human: Stop AI agents from leaving zombie terminals in VS Code and GitHub Codespaces.
description_for_model: Provides terminal management rules for AI coding agents. When an AI agent runs terminal commands in VS Code or GitHub Codespaces, it should always use isBackground: true to get a terminal ID, then kill the terminal after the command completes. This prevents zombie terminals from accumulating and breaking the agent's ability to use the terminal.
